scenario_text.value:
What do you make of that woman? Why do you
think she’s arguing with Kaito?
I have no idea. We’ll just have to find out.
I think so. Good luck, Takuma!
What? You’re leaving this to me?!

Yeah, man. I can’t talk to someone that
pretty. Makes me super nervous.

Minoru, when you speak so casually, it just
makes it obvious that you’re being insincere.
I’m doing it on purpose, okay?!

Kaito and that woman are saying completely
different things. Whose story do we trust?

Well, if you ask me, we should talk more with
that woman.

I mean, just look at her! Man, she even
smells nice...

Haha, Minoru, you look funny! Your whole face
is red.

I am serious! It’s not like I’m deciding
based on looks because I’m so confused!

Uh, right, okay. I think I see where you’re
coming from.

Seriously, you should go listen to more of
that woman’s story!
